step: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Whisk together the flour, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl and set aside.
Beat the butter, brown sugar and granulated sugar with an electric mixer on medium-high speed in a large bowl until well combined, about 2 minutes.
Add the eggs and vanilla and beat until light in color, 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the flour mixture and mix on low speed until well incorporated. Fold in the chocolate chips by hand using a rubber spatula.
recipe.title: Chewy Chocolate Chip Cookies
